name: Monster Under
description:
Monster Under follows the story of a boy in the midst of the night who has to  survive the terror of a monster that came from under...

This game doesn't contain anything too graphic nor too surprising. I don't think it needs a warning and I also think it's safe to say that  children can play but it's not recommended.

Minor Update

I got some feedback saying that players couldn't see the monster. Well, the flashlight breaks when shining it on the monster but I forgot to mention that in the game. Sorry!

I updated the game to make sure that it gets mentioned and I made a few tweaks to the flashlight so the monster won't instantly run away upon contact with it.

Hope it helps!

Controls
  • WASD to Move
  • Mouse to Look Around
  • Left-Click to Interact
  • E to Toggle Flashlight
  • Q to Crawl Out
  • F to Fix Flashlight
  • Hold ESC to Quit
